Instruction: In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. Add the butter, and mix until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
Slice each potato in half lengthwise.

Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Wrap each potato half tightly in a square of aluminum foil after placing 1/2 tablespoon of butter on the cut side and seasoning it with garlic powder and salt.
Remove potatoes from the oven and let cool for a few minutes before unwrapping.
